Question: Can you show me the names and average stars of reviews written for businesses in the 'Fast Food' category located in 'San Francisco' that were reviewed after January 1st, 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City), (category:Category)<-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]-(business)-[for:REVIEWS]->(review:Review)-[write:WROTE]->(user:User)
WHERE city.name="San Francisco" AND category.name="Fast Food" AND review.date >= date("2023-01-01")
RETURN business, inCity, city, category, inCategory, review, for, write, user, business.name, AVG(review.stars)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City), (category:Category)<-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]-(business)-[for:REVIEWS]-(review:Review)-[write:WROTE]-(user:User)
WHERE city.name="San Francisco" AND category.name="Fast Food" AND review.date >= date("2023-01-01")
RETURN business, inCity, city, category, inCategory, review, for, write, user, business.name, AVG(review.stars)
Rewrite: Could you display the names and average ratings of reviews for 'Fast Food' establishments in 'San Francisco' that received reviews post-January 1st, 2023?

Question: What are the captions of photos tagged with the label 'interior' in businesses where users who have an average review score of over 4 stars and are friends with 'John Doe' have written reviews?
Cypher:
MATCH (johnDoe:User {name: "John Doe"})-[friendship:FRIENDS]->(friend:User)-[wroteReview:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviewLink:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)
WHERE avg(review.stars) > 4
MATCH (business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label {description: "interior"})
RETURN johnDoe, friendship, friend, wroteReview, review, reviewLink, business, hasPhoto, photo, hasLabel, label, photo.caption

Question: For the business 'Joe's Diner' in 'Cleveland', could you retrieve the name and ID of all users who have reviewed this business and are also labeled as friends of 'Mary Allen'?
Cypher:
MATCH (mary:User {name:"Mary Allen"})-[friend:FRIENDS]->(user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business {name:"Joe's Diner"}), (business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Cleveland"})
RETURN mary, friend, user, wrote, review, reviews, business, inCity, city, user.id, user.name
Rewrite: Could you provide the names and IDs of all users who have reviewed 'Joe's Diner' in 'Cleveland' and are marked as friends of 'Mary Allen'?

Question: Identify the addresses and names of all businesses classified under the 'Gym' category in 'Miami' that have received reviews with 5-stars from users who are also friends with at least one other user with a review rating average higher than 3.
Cypher:
MATCH (category:Category {name:"Gym"})<-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]-(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Miami"})
MATCH (business)<-[reviews:REVIEWS]-(review:Review)-[wrote:WROTE]-(user:User)-[friends:FRIENDS]-(friend:User)
WHERE review.stars=5 AND EXISTS {
  MATCH (friend)-[fWrote:WROTE]->(fReview:Review)
  RETURN AVG(fReview.stars) > 3
}
RETURN category, inCategory, business, inCity, city, reviews, review, wrote, user, friends, friend, business.id, business.name, business.address
Semantic-EQL-Question: Can you list the businesses classified as gyms in Miami whose users received 5-star reviews and have friends who are also active reviewers with an average rating of over 3 stars?
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (category:Category {name:"Gym"})<-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]-(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Miami"})
MATCH (business)<-[reviews:REVIEWS]-(review:Review)-[wrote:WROTE]-(user:User)-[friends:FRIENDS]-(friend:User)
WHERE review.stars=5 AND EXISTS {
  MATCH (friend)-[fWrote:WROTE]->(fReview:Review)
  RETURN fWrote, fReview, category, AVG(fReview.stars) > 3
}
RETURN category, inCategory, business, inCity, city, reviews, review, wrote, user, friends, friend, business.id, business.name, business.address
Rewrite: Find the names and addresses of all 'Gym' category businesses in 'Miami' that have been rated 5-stars by users who are friends with at least one other user whose average review rating exceeds 3.

Question: List the descriptions of labels associated with photos for businesses that have been written a review by 'Alice Bobson', along with the review text and business location.
Cypher:
MATCH (alice:User {name:"Alice Bobson"})-[wroteReview:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviewToBusiness:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[businessToPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[photoHasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN alice, wroteReview, review, reviewToBusiness, business, businessToPhoto, photo, photoHasLabel, label, label.description, review.text, business.location
Rewrite: Provide the descriptions of labels linked to photos from businesses reviewed by 'Alice Bobson', including the review content and the location of the business.

Question: Provide the names and text of reviews written by users living in 'Seattle' for businesses that fall in the 'Electronics' category whose reviews have 2 or less stars.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[write:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[for:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category),
      (business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name = "Seattle" AND category.name = "Electronics" AND review.stars <= 2
RETURN user, write, review, for, business, inCategory, category, inCity, city, review.text, user.name
Rewrite: List the names and review texts from users based in 'Seattle' for 'Electronics' businesses that received reviews with ratings of 2 stars or fewer.

Question: What are the scores of 'HAS_LABEL' relations for photos at businesses in 'Los Angeles' which are in the 'Restaurant' category and have received a review on 'June 15, 2023'?
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Los Angeles"}), 
      (business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name:"Restaurant"}), 
      (business)-[:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label),
      (review:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE review.date = date("2023-06-15")
RETURN business, city, category, photo, hasLabel, label, review, hasLabel.score
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[relation6:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Los Angeles"}), 
      (business)-[relation7:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name:"Restaurant"}), 
      (business)-[relation8:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label),
      (review:Review)-[relation10:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE review.date = date("2023-06-15")
RETURN relation10, relation8, relation7, relation6, business, city, category, photo, hasLabel, label, review, hasLabel.score
Rewrite: For photos at 'Los Angeles' businesses categorized as 'Restaurant' with reviews on 'June 15, 2023', what are the 'HAS_LABEL' relation scores?

Question: Can you find the 'WROTE_TIP' text for all tips made to businesses located in 'New York', categorized under 'Coffee & Tea', on the same day a 5-star review was posted?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category), 
      (review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name = "New York" AND category.name = "Coffee & Tea" AND review.date = wroteTip.date AND review.stars = 5
RETURN user, wroteTip, business, inCategory, category, review, reviews, inCity, city, wroteTip.text
Rewrite: Can you locate the 'WROTE_TIP' text for each tip given to businesses in 'New York' listed under 'Coffee & Tea', on the day a 5-star review was made?

Question: Retrieve the labeling scores for photos taken in 'Chicago', linked via 'HAS_LABEL' relationship to labels with a description containing 'modern', at businesses reviewed by more than 20 users.
Cypher:
MATCH (city:City {name:"Chicago"})<-[inCity:IN_CITY]-(business:Business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
WHERE label.description CONTAINS "modern"
WITH business, photo, label, hasLabel
MATCH (review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business)
WITH business, photo, label, hasLabel, COUNT(review) AS reviewCount
WHERE reviewCount > 20
RETURN business, photo, label, hasLabel, hasLabel.score
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (city:City {name:"Chicago"})<-[inCity:IN_CITY]-(business:Business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
WHERE label.description CONTAINS "modern"
WITH business, photo, label, hasLabel
MATCH (review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business)
WITH business, photo, label, hasLabel, COUNT(review) AS reviewCount
WHERE reviewCount > 20
RETURN reviews, hasPhoto, inCity, review, city, business, photo, label, hasLabel, hasLabel.score

Question: I want to see all 'SIMILAR' relationship scores between users who are both friends with 'Lisa Right' and have rated the same 'Heating & Plumbing' business in 'Boston'.
Cypher:
MATCH (lisaRight:User {name:"Lisa Right"})-[friendship1:FRIENDS]->(user1:User)-[wroteReview1:WROTE]->(review1:Review)-[reviewFor:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)
MATCH (lisaRight)-[friendship2:FRIENDS]->(user2:User)-[wroteReview2:WROTE]->(review2:Review)-[reviewFor]->(business)
MATCH (business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name:"Heating & Plumbing"})
MATCH (business)-[:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Boston"})
MATCH (user1)-[similarity:SIMILAR]->(user2)
RETURN user1, friendship1, wroteReview1, review1, reviewFor, business, category, city, user2, friendship2, wroteReview2, review2, similarity, similarity.score
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (lisaRight:User {name:"Lisa Right"})-[friendship1:FRIENDS]->(user1:User)-[wroteReview1:WROTE]->(review1:Review)-[reviewFor:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)
MATCH (lisaRight)-[friendship2:FRIENDS]->(user2:User)-[wroteReview2:WROTE]->(review2:Review)-[reviewFor]->(business)
MATCH (business)-[relation14:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name:"Heating & Plumbing"})
MATCH (business)-[relation15:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Boston"})
MATCH (user1)-[similarity:SIMILAR]->(user2)
RETURN relation15, relation14, lisaRight, user1, friendship1, wroteReview1, review1, reviewFor, business, category, city, user2, friendship2, wroteReview2, review2, similarity, similarity.score
Semantic-EQL-Question: Could you detail the interactions and review scores among friends of Lisa Right who shared their experiences with businesses specialized in heating and plumbing in Boston?
Rewrite: I am interested in viewing the 'SIMILAR' relationship scores for users who are mutual friends with 'Lisa Right' and have both reviewed the same 'Heating & Plumbing' company in 'Boston'.

Question: Show the likes count on tips ('WROTE_TIP' relations) created by users in 'San Diego' who are directly friends with 'Michael Smith' on July 4th, 2022.
Cypher:
MATCH (michaelSmith:User {name:"Michael Smith"})-[friendship:FRIENDS]->(friend:User)-[tipWritten:WROTE_TIP]->(business:Business)-[locatedIn:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"San Diego"})
WHERE tipWritten.date = date('2022-07-04')
RETURN michaelSmith, friendship, friend, tipWritten, business, locatedIn, city, tipWritten.likes
Rewrite: Display the number of likes for tips authored by users from 'San Diego' who are direct friends with 'Michael Smith', specifically those tips written on July 4th, 2022.

Question: I need the 'HAS_PHOTO' relation details for business named 'Sam's Electronics', including photo IDs and corresponding user who wrote the review, during the 'Black Friday' event of 2022.
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business {name:"Sam's Electronics"})-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)
MATCH (review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business)
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review)
WHERE review.date >= date("2022-11-25") AND review.date <= date("2022-11-25")
RETURN business, hasPhoto, photo, review, reviews, user, wrote, photo.id
Rewrite: For the 2022 'Black Friday' event, I require the 'HAS_PHOTO' relation specifics, including photo IDs and the respective reviewers, for the business 'Sam's Electronics'.

Question: What is the average score of 'SIMILAR' relations between users who have written reviews for businesses in the 'Italian Cuisine' category within 'Philadelphia' during 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (category:Category {name: "Italian Cuisine"})<-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]-(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name: "Philadelphia"})
MATCH (user1:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE review.date.year = 2023
MATCH (user1)-[similar:SIMILAR]-(user2:User)
RETURN AVG(similar.score)
Rewrite: What is the mean score of 'SIMILAR' relationships among users who posted reviews for 'Italian Cuisine' businesses in 'Philadelphia' throughout 2023?

Question: Can you calculate the minimum score among 'HAS_LABEL' relations for photos connected to 'Beauty Salons' in Miami?
Rewrite: Could you determine the lowest score for the 'HAS_LABEL' relations linked to photos associated with 'Beauty Salons' in Miami?

Question: What is the total number of friends ('FRIENDS' relation) for users who have provided reviews with exactly 3 stars for businesses in the 'Retail' category across all cities?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE review.stars = 3 AND category.name = "Retail"
WITH DISTINCT user
MATCH (user)-[friends:FRIENDS]-(friend:User)
RETURN COUNT(friends) AS totalNumberOfFriends
Rewrite: How many friends (from the 'FRIENDS' relation) do users have if they have given exactly 3-star reviews to businesses in the 'Retail' category in various cities?

Question: Show the maximum likes on any tip ('WROTE_TIP' relation) written to 'Barbecue' restaurants in 'Austin' that also received at least three reviews on the same day.
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name: "Barbecue"}),
      (business)-[:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name: "Austin"}),
      (user:User)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business),
      (review:Review)-[reviewsBusiness:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE review.date = wroteTip.date
WITH wroteTip, COUNT(review) AS reviewsCount
WHERE reviewsCount >= 3
RETURN MAX(wroteTip.likes)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[relation5:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name: "Barbecue"}),
      (business)-[relation6:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name: "Austin"}),
      (user:User)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business),
      (review:Review)-[reviewsBusiness:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE review.date = wroteTip.date
WITH wroteTip, COUNT(review) AS reviewsCount
WHERE reviewsCount >= 3
RETURN MAX(wroteTip.likes)
Rewrite: Display the highest number of likes for any tip (related by 'WROTE_TIP') written about 'Barbecue' restaurants in 'Austin' that also garnered a minimum of three reviews on the same day.

Question: Could you provide the count of unique photos ('HAS_PHOTO' relation) posted for all 'Car Dealerships' in 'San Jose' that have an average star rating over 4?
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category),
      (business)-[:IN_CITY]->(city:City),
      (business)<-[:REVIEWS]-(review:Review),
      (business)<-[:HAS_PHOTO]-(photo:Photo)
WHERE category.name = "Car Dealerships" AND city.name = "San Jose"
WITH business, AVG(review.stars) AS average_stars, COUNT(DISTINCT photo) AS photo_count
WHERE average_stars > 4
RETURN SUM(photo_count) AS total_unique_photos
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[relation5:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category),
      (business)-[relation6:IN_CITY]->(city:City),
      (business)<-[relation7:REVIEWS]-(review:Review),
      (business)-[relation8:HAS_PHOTO]-(photo:Photo)
WHERE category.name = "Car Dealerships" AND city.name = "San Jose"
WITH business, AVG(review.stars) AS average_stars, COUNT(DISTINCT photo) AS photo_count
WHERE average_stars > 4
RETURN SUM(photo_count) AS total_unique_photos
Rewrite: Can you supply the number of distinct images ('HAS_PHOTO' relation) shared by all 'Car Dealerships' in 'San Jose' with an average star rating above 4?

Question: Calculate the average labeling score for photos ('HAS_LABEL' relation) associated with businesses located in 'Orlando' within the 'Fast Food' category.
Rewrite: Determine the mean labeling score for pictures ('HAS_LABEL' relation) linked to businesses situated in 'Orlando' that fall under the 'Fast Food' category.
